data.message:
Hi.
I have received a strange e-mails regarding a lottery. It seems something fishy in this . Wondering if this is coming from you.It says so here in the beginning of the email.  Facebook Lottery Programme
Menlo Park, CA 94025,
United States of America

replies.message: Hey Greta, this sounds like a hoax email. Please disregard the message and be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Kate
Facebook I've sent a message yesterday. It's not seen yet. Can you reply please?
